units.title: Biological Sciences — AC9S8U01 — Cells and systems
units.whyThis: This activity introduces Biological Sciences at a level that suits you.

units.title: Earth & Space Sciences — AC9S7U02 — Sun–Earth–Moon phenomena
units.whyThis: You’ve already learned some Earth & Space Sciences, so this Y7 activity is the next step to extend it.

units.title: Physical Sciences — AC9S7U03 — Forces (incl. friction & gravity)
units.whyThis: You’ve already learned some Physical Sciences, so this Y7 activity is the next step to extend it.

careers.title: Forensic Scientist
careers.whyThis: This career is connected to the science areas you’ve been learning. You still need inquiry skills like planning & conducting. We relaxed the rules to show this career to you now.
